ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] A question for you all
ygData.msgSnippet: It has been well over 3 months that I cancled the account.  Could they still be there?  That would be good!!! John Russo
ygData.messageBody:
It has been well over 3 months that I cancled the account. Could
they still be there? That would be good!!!

John Russo




--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, Luis Binnier
<shannara200@y...> wrote:
> Just to let you know if you use your old login name
> and password, chances are you will get your old
> characters back.
>
> Luis
> --- "John Russo <john_russo2000@y...>"
> <john_russo2000@y...> wrote:

> > not lost my other

> >
> > John Russo
